title: tired of people asking for CS riven-so here is a post by a rioter saying when it will b available
body:
Now plz STOP asking
i made a thread about this a while back. a rioter repsonded and this is what he said
Hey guys,

Just wanted to chime in here. Hippalus noted in a Q&A:
"Yes I think Championship Riven will come back someday. Most limited edition skins took four years to come back after release, and it's been two years for Riven so far."

Source: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com...mment=00350002

Hopefully you guys can see the benefit of releasing limited skins again. But it's mainly for players that for one reason or another missed out on getting the skin when it first came out. 

"Every day we receive heartfelt emails with compelling stories from players asking for the chance to own or gift their favorite skin, either because they missed the brief store window due to travel, illness, deployment, etc., or because they hadn’t joined the LoL community yet."

You can find the full article about limited edition skins here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/ne...-edition-skins
